scripts.test: npm run test:main && npm run test:addresses && npm run test:node:platform && npm run test:residential
scripts.test:node:platform: npm run test:node-win || npm run test:node
scripts.test:node: curl -sL https://github.com/geolonia/japanese-addresses/archive/refs/heads/master.tar.gz | tar xvfz - -C ./test > nul 2>&1 && jest test/fs.test.ts
scripts.test:node-win: curl -sL https://github.com/geolonia/japanese-addresses/archive/refs/heads/master.tar.gz -o master.tar.gz && 7z x master.tar.gz -y -o./ && 7z x ./master.tar -y -o./test && del master.tar.gz master.tar && jest test/fs.test.ts
scripts.clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); try { fs.rmSync('dist', { recursive: true, force: true }) } catch (err) { console.error(err) }"
